appName: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
displayName: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
display_name: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
display_long_description:
# 💀 DEATH GAME HOTEL – High-Stakes VR Poker Like Never Before!

Death Game Hotel is an intense VR poker battle, blending high-risk gambling with survival. Face off in Death Poker, where you bet more than chips—you risk your body parts!

[media]



# 🃏 Death Poker – Raise the Stakes

A twisted take on Texas Hold’em with a deadly new ‘Death’ suit:

Strongest Hand → Hands with a Death card
Weakest Hand → Can’t use Death? You lose.
Go All In → Bet chips… or your hands, eyes, or ears
Can you handle the pressure?

[media]



# 🎲 Goblet of the Reaper – Deadly Strategy

Drop stone slabs into the goblet—don’t let it overflow!
Spill too much, and the Reaper arrives for a life-or-death showdown.
1v1 mode intensifies the mind games!

[media]



# 🤥 Cheat Your Way to Victory

Use VR-exclusive tricks to gain an edge:

Death Poker → Swap cards, peek at the next draw
Goblet of the Reaper → Prevent spills, track slab counts
If you don’t get caught, it’s not cheating.

[media]



# 🔥 Multiplayer & Solo Modes

6-player matches with real-time bluffing
20-player social lobbies
Single-Player Mode: Death Game 2000

[media]



# 🚀 Free to Play – Download Now!

Freemium model—no purchase required
Solo Mode: Death Slot for high-risk fun
🎲 Are you ready to risk it all? Download now and play for free!

[media]

# 📢 Stay Updated

DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/deathgamehotel

X: https://x.com/WhiteOwlsInc

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/whiteowlsinc/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WhiteOwlsInc

**🔥 SWERY and the devs might join the game on weekends… will you face them?**
